caseStudies.title: CASE STUDY #002 â€“ The Israeli Mossad Dubai Hit
caseStudies.description: An in-depth breakdown of the 2010 Mossad operation in Dubai, which resulted in the assassination of Hamas operative Mahmoud al-Mabhouh. Covers surveillance footage analysis, passport cloning, team coordination, and international response.

caseStudies.title: CASE STUDY #001 - Corporate Espionage: The Inside Job
caseStudies.description: A detailed analysis of a sophisticated corporate espionage operation that compromised a Fortune 500 company's intellectual property. This case study examines the methodology, tradecraft, and lessons learned from both the attacker and defender perspectives.
